Interface GeometryCompressedParams

Pre-compressed geometry creation parameters for SceneModel.createGeometryCompressed.

Summary
  • Created from GeometryParams using {@link compressGeometryParams}
  • Used with SceneModel.createGeometryCompressed
  • Simplifies geometry by combining duplicate positions and adjusting indices
  • Generates edge indices for triangle meshes
  • Ignores normals (our shaders auto-generate them)
  • Converts positions to relative-to-center (RTC) coordinates
  • Quantizes positions and UVs as 16-bit unsigned integers
  • Splits geometry into buckets to enable indices to use the minimum storage bits

Hierarchy

  • GeometryCompressedParams

Properties

Optional aabb

aabb: FloatArrayParam
  • Defined in webviewer/src/viewer/scene/GeometryCompressedParams.ts:53

Axis-aligned, non-quantized 3D boundary of the geometry's vertex positions.

The boundary coordinates are relative to GeometryCompressedParams.origin.

geometryBuckets

geometryBuckets: GeometryBucketParams[]
  • Defined in webviewer/src/viewer/scene/GeometryCompressedParams.ts:72

The geometry arrays, organized into buckets for optimal memory use.

The bucketing strategy aims to reduce memory consumed by indices. There are three buckets, each with an indices array that requires a different number of bits for its values. The first bucket's indices contain 8-bit values in range [0...255], the second contains 16-bit values in range [256..65535], and the third contains 32-bit values in range [65536...2147483647]. With this strategy, we avoid wasting storage bits on the 8-bit and 16-bit values.

The buckets also partition the geometry positions and UVs, so that the indices are indexing positions and UVs that are local to their bucket. This further optimizes memory use, by reducing the values of large indices to small locally-offset values, which can reduce the number of bits they need.

id

id: string
  • Defined in webviewer/src/viewer/scene/GeometryCompressedParams.ts:23

ID for the geometry.

Optional origin

origin: FloatArrayParam
  • Defined in webviewer/src/viewer/scene/GeometryCompressedParams.ts:38

The origin of the geometry's 3D relative-to-center (RTC) coordinate system.

Assumed to be [0,0,0] by default.

positionsDecompressMatrix

positionsDecompressMatrix: FloatArrayParam
  • Defined in webviewer/src/viewer/scene/GeometryCompressedParams.ts:46

Matrix to decompress GeometryBucketParams.positionsCompressed.

The WebViewer uses this matrix internally to decompress (dequantize) GeometryBucketParams.positionsCompressed back to 32-bit floating-point relative-to-center (RTC) coordinates that are relative to GeometryCompressedParams.origin.

primitive

primitive: number
  • Defined in webviewer/src/viewer/scene/GeometryCompressedParams.ts:31

Primitive type.

Possible values are {@link SolidPrimitive}, {@link SurfacePrimitive}, {@link LinesPrimitive}, {@link PointsPrimitive} and {@link TrianglesPrimitive}.

Optional uvsDecompressMatrix

uvsDecompressMatrix: FloatArrayParam
  • Defined in webviewer/src/viewer/scene/GeometryCompressedParams.ts:58

4x4 matrix to de-quantize the geometry's UV coordinates, when UVs are provided.
